values.code: DATATYPEFACTORY_PROPERTY
values.desc: Default property name as defined in JSR 206: Java(TM) API for XML Processing (JAXP) 1.

values.code: newDuration(lexicalRepresentation: String!)
values.desc: Obtain a new instance of a Duration specifying the Duration as its string representation, "PnYnMnDTnHnMnS", as defined in XML Schema 1.

values.code: newDuration(durationInMilliSeconds: Long)
values.desc: Obtain a new instance of a Duration specifying the Duration as milliseconds.

values.code: newDuration(isPositive: Boolean, years: BigInteger!, months: BigInteger!, days: BigInteger!, hours: BigInteger!, minutes: BigInteger!, seconds: BigDecimal!)
values.desc: Obtain a new instance of a Duration specifying the Duration as isPositive, years, months, days, hours, minutes, seconds.

values.code: newDuration(isPositive: Boolean, years: Int, months: Int, days: Int, hours: Int, minutes: Int, seconds: Int)
values.desc: Obtain a new instance of a Duration specifying the Duration as isPositive, years, months, days, hours, minutes, seconds.

values.code: newDurationDayTime(lexicalRepresentation: String!)
values.desc: Create a Duration of type xdt:dayTimeDuration by parsing its String representation, "PnDTnHnMnS",  XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model, xdt:dayTimeDuration.

values.code: newDurationDayTime(durationInMilliseconds: Long)
values.desc: Create a Duration of type xdt:dayTimeDuration using the specified milliseconds as defined in  XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model, xdt:dayTimeDuration.

values.code: newDurationDayTime(isPositive: Boolean, day: BigInteger!, hour: BigInteger!, minute: BigInteger!, second: BigInteger!)
values.desc: Create a Duration of type xdt:dayTimeDuration using the specified day, hour, minute and second as defined in  XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model, xdt:dayTimeDuration.

values.code: newDurationDayTime(isPositive: Boolean, day: Int, hour: Int, minute: Int, second: Int)
values.desc: Create a Duration of type xdt:dayTimeDuration using the specified day, hour, minute and second as defined in  XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model, xdt:dayTimeDuration.

values.code: newDurationYearMonth(lexicalRepresentation: String!)
values.desc: Create a Duration of type xdt:yearMonthDuration by parsing its String representation, "PnYnM",  XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model, xdt:yearMonthDuration.

values.code: newDurationYearMonth(durationInMilliseconds: Long)
values.desc: Create a Duration of type xdt:yearMonthDuration using the specified milliseconds as defined in  XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model, xdt:yearMonthDuration.

values.code: newDurationYearMonth(isPositive: Boolean, year: BigInteger!, month: BigInteger!)
values.desc: Create a Duration of type xdt:yearMonthDuration using the specified year and month as defined in  XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model, xdt:yearMonthDuration.

values.code: newDurationYearMonth(isPositive: Boolean, year: Int, month: Int)
values.desc: Create a Duration of type xdt:yearMonthDuration using the specified year and month as defined in  XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model, xdt:yearMonthDuration.

values.code: newInstance()
values.desc: Obtain a new instance of a DatatypeFactory.

values.code: newInstance(factoryClassName: String!, classLoader: ClassLoader!)
values.desc: Returns an instance of the named implementation of DatatypeFactory.

values.code: newXMLGregorianCalendar()
values.desc: Create a new instance of an XMLGregorianCalendar.

values.code: newXMLGregorianCalendar(lexicalRepresentation: String!)
values.desc: Create a new XMLGregorianCalendar by parsing the String as a lexical representation.

values.code: newXMLGregorianCalendar(cal: GregorianCalendar!)
values.desc: Create an XMLGregorianCalendar from a GregorianCalendar.

values.code: newXMLGregorianCalendar(year: BigInteger!, month: Int, day: Int, hour: Int, minute: Int, second: Int, fractionalSecond: BigDecimal!, timezone: Int)
values.desc: Constructor allowing for complete value spaces allowed by W3C XML Schema 1.

values.code: newXMLGregorianCalendar(year: Int, month: Int, day: Int, hour: Int, minute: Int, second: Int, millisecond: Int, timezone: Int)
values.desc: Constructor of value spaces that a java.util.GregorianCalendar instance would need to convert to an XMLGregorianCalendar instance.

values.code: newXMLGregorianCalendarDate(year: Int, month: Int, day: Int, timezone: Int)
values.desc: Create a Java representation of XML Schema builtin datatype date or g*.

values.code: newXMLGregorianCalendarTime(hours: Int, minutes: Int, seconds: Int, timezone: Int)
values.desc: Create a Java instance of XML Schema builtin datatype time.

values.code: newXMLGregorianCalendarTime(hours: Int, minutes: Int, seconds: Int, fractionalSecond: BigDecimal!, timezone: Int)
values.desc: Create a Java instance of XML Schema builtin datatype time.

values.code: newXMLGregorianCalendarTime(hours: Int, minutes: Int, seconds: Int, milliseconds: Int, timezone: Int)
values.desc: Create a Java instance of XML Schema builtin datatype time.
